intro: Cleisostomopsis elytrigera, commonly known as the narrowleaf sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of North America. Cleisostomopsis elytrigera is adapted to withstand drought conditions and is considered a hardy species for xeriscaping.
